technology_stack: Next.js 15 + React 19 + TypeScript + Framer Motion + Supabase

mcp_tools_configured.name: context7
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add --transport sse context7 https://mcp.context7.com/sse
mcp_tools_configured.purpose: Framer Motion patterns and library documentation

mcp_tools_configured.name: deepwiki
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add --transport sse deepwiki https://mcp.deepwiki.com/sse
mcp_tools_configured.purpose: Animation success pattern research and best practices

mcp_tools_configured.name: playwright
mcp_tools_configured.purpose: Animation E2E testing and frame-by-frame validation

mcp_tools_configured.name: vercel
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add --transport http vercel https://mcp.vercel.com
mcp_tools_configured.purpose: Deployment optimization and edge function management

mcp_tools_configured.name: brave-search
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add brave-search --env BRAVE_API_KEY=*** -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search

mcp_tools_configured.name: cloudinary
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add cloudinary --env CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME=placeholder --env CLOUDINARY_API_KEY=placeholder --env CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET=placeholder -- npx -y cloudinary-mcp-server
mcp_tools_configured.purpose: Kawaii image optimization and responsive delivery
mcp_tools_configured.fallback_strategy: Next.js Image component with manual optimization

mcp_tools_configured.name: supabase
mcp_tools_configured.error: NPM package not found or invalid credentials: @supabase/mcp-server
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add supabase --env SUPABASE_URL=*** --env SUPABASE_ANON_KEY=*** -- npx -y @supabase/mcp-server
mcp_tools_configured.fallback_strategy: Manual Supabase client setup with performance monitoring

mcp_tools_configured.name: nextjs-monitor
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add nextjs-monitor --env NEXT_PROJECT_PATH=/projects/kawaii-reading-blog -- npx -y nextjs-performance-mcp
mcp_tools_configured.fallback_strategy: Manual performance monitoring with React DevTools and Chrome DevTools

mcp_tools_configured.name: figma
mcp_tools_configured.setup_command: claude mcp add figma --env FIGMA_ACCESS_TOKEN=*** -- npx -y figma-mcp-server
mcp_tools_configured.purpose: Kawaii design system automation and token sync
mcp_tools_configured.fallback_strategy: Manual design token implementation with Tailwind CSS

recommendations: All 4 critical MCP tools (Context7, DeepWiki, Playwright, Vercel) configured successfully
Cloudinary connected with placeholder credentials - requires real API keys for production
Supabase MCP setup failed - use manual Supabase client setup as fallback
Next.js performance monitoring MCP unavailable - implement custom monitoring
Figma MCP unavailable - use manual design token implementation
Enhanced implementation agent ready with 6 working MCP tools out of 9 attempted

supabase_optimization.strategy: Manual Supabase client with performance monitoring

performance_monitoring.implementation: React DevTools Profiler + Chrome Performance API

design_system.implementation: Tailwind CSS custom theme with kawaii color palette
design_system.automation: Manual design token updates and validation
